name: Linench
description: You are trying to pass the levels by thinking or improvising in this cast. Is it where you hang out? Follow your steps back and try different ways to reach the end.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
